text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Financial assistance" means a grant or loan from the Fund.
"Fund" means the Baltimore City Community Enhancement Transit-Oriented Development Fund.

"Qualified project area" means a community that is:
located in Baltimore City; and
directly impacted by and within 0.5 miles of the boundary of a development that has been designated as a transit-oriented development.

"Qualified recipient" means an entity that is based in and serves a qualified project area and is:
a not for profit community-based organization that has experience in making physical, human capital, and economic investments to rebuild communities; or
a community development corporation.
"Transit-oriented development" has the meaning stated in § 7-101 of the Transportation Article.
